body_html:
Oh, I see. It's the same error here:
http://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tf-master-win-bzl/77/console

The reason is Bazel 0.4.0 doesn't allow *.lib files to be sources of cc_library, this is also fixed at HEAD in Bazel repo. Is it ok for you to build Bazel from HEAD, or you can download the binary built by our ci here:
http://ci.bazel.io/view/Bazel%20bootstrap%20and%20maintenance/job/Bazel/JAVA_VERSION=1.8,PLATFORM_NAME=windows-x86_64/

Thanks for your patience with Bazel, we'll make it better soon!

http://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tf-master-win-bzl/77/console
The reason is Bazel 0.4.0 doesn't allow *.lib files to be sources of cc_library, this is also fixed at HEAD in Bazel repo. Is it ok for you to build Bazel from HEAD, or you can download the binary built by our ci here:
http://ci.bazel.io/view/Bazel%20bootstrap%20and%20maintenance/job/Bazel/JAVA_VERSION=1.8,PLATFORM_NAME=windows-x86_64/

body:
Oh, I see. It's the same error here:
http://ci.tensorflow.org/job/tf-master-win-bzl/77/console

The reason is Bazel 0.4.0 doesn't allow `*.lib` files to be sources of cc_library, this is also fixed at HEAD in Bazel repo. Is it ok for you to build Bazel from HEAD, or you can download the binary built by our ci here:
http://ci.bazel.io/view/Bazel%20bootstrap%20and%20maintenance/job/Bazel/JAVA_VERSION=1.8,PLATFORM_NAME=windows-x86_64/

Thanks for your patience with Bazel, we'll make it better soon!
